name: nanbi1i
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w1)), wb(w0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w1))
-| wb(w0, w2)
-| wi(wb(w0, w2), wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w1))
-| wb(w0, w2)
-| wi(wb(w0, w2), wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wb(w0, w2), wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wnan(w0, w1), wnan(w2, w1))
-| wb(w0, w2)

comment: Introduce a right anti-conjunct to both sides of a logical equivalence. (Contributed by SF, 2-Jan-2018.)
